title: Rysons Steel Wool Pads, 12 Pack, Heavy Duty Scouring Pads
features: Multipurpose: These 16 soap-filled scourer pads are ideal for tackling tough, baked-on messes on various surfaces.
Dual-Action Cleaning: The abrasive scourer side removes stubborn stains, while the soap-infused side cuts through grease and grime.
Heavy-Duty: Designed for the toughest cleaning jobs, these pads are durable and long-lasting.
Convenient Pack: This pack contains 16 pads, ensuring you have a sufficient supply for all your cleaning needs.
Versatile Usage: Suitable for use on pots, pans, sinks, countertops, and other kitchen surfaces.
description: These steel wool pads from Jayting are the perfect heavy-duty cleaning solution for tackling tough grease and dirt. The pack contains 12 durable pads made from coarse steel wool, ideal for fine sanding and smoothing surfaces. These versatile pads can remove rust from tools, polish metal, and scrub stubborn grime from cookware and surfaces. Their rough texture makes them great for cleaning baked-on messes and restoring shine to dull surfaces. Compact and long-lasting, these steel wool pads are designed for rigorous use, ensuring you get your money's worth. Keep a pack handy for all your tough cleaning needs around the home or workshop.
